text: Hi, my name is Robert.
Hi Robert, I'm Jonathan.
Have you ever heard of "Save the Children"?
I have not.
Save the children is a foundation that help needy kids.
Excellent, I'm happy to hear about people helping those in need.
I am trying to get people interest in donating to the cause.
Okay, it is something that I am interested in looking into.
Any money you donate will be handled by a research team. I am going to tell you a little how it works.
Great, I am new to this and am unfamiliar how this works.
Any and all money donate will be handled by a The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
Where does the money come from?
The money will be deduct from your earnings when you complete this hit.
Okay, so up to $0.30, then?
anywhere from 1 cent to 2.00 dollars, so take your time and decide.
I'm still very, very new to mturk so I'll donate the $0.30 from this HIT.
Do you want to this donation to go to one child or a group of children?
Go to a group.
Thank you very much for your donation.
Thank you too.
